room_title: Escape room "Bayou Nightmare" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: Was so much fun! Did the Bayou Nightmare will most definitely be going back! And can't wait to try the Halloween room!

room_title: Escape room "Bayou Nightmare" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: We did the Bayou room. It was awesome! We had so much fun. We will definitely visit again.

room_title: Escape room "Bayou Nightmare" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: We had a blast in the Bayou Nightmare room! The staff is very personable and informative. These scenarios are a fantastic quality time for families! Especially with teenagers. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Bayou Nightmare" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: We had a blast playing Bayou Nightmare! The game was difficult, but still fun at the same time. We escaped with two minutes to spare! We have been twice already and definitely want to try out all of the rooms. Love this place, highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Bayou Nightmare" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: We had an absolute blast! The Bayou Nightmare room was challenging but so much fun! The game master was very helpful and always gave great clues to help us along the way when we got stuck. I loved how they really made you feel like you were part of the scenario. The room was dark and you could only use flashlights! We will definitely be going back soon to try another room!
